Package org.jdesktop.jdic.filetypes

Class Summary
Action This class represents a key/value mapping pair.
Association This class abstracts the cross-platform registration information for one file type.
AssociationService This class provides relevant services for association.
 

Exception Summary
AssociationAlreadyRegisteredException Thrown by methods when trying to add an association already existed in the system.
AssociationException Base class for all exception classes for association service.
AssociationNotRegisteredException Thrown by methods when trying to remove an association not existed in the system.
RegisterFailedException Thrown by methods when registering/unregistering an association failed.
